September 19, 1957
Kohey Ivaeaki

3 Kltakyutaro-machi

Dear Mr. Ivascdtlt
Under separate cover I am forvardlng to you a rec^t study made by
one of our students of radio activity on our can^s.
I am sorry I do not have more material available in the categories
you listed. I am however, forwarding your request to the National
Association of Educational ^oadcastors in Urbana, Illinois. I am
sure thiqr will have the information you are looking for or else will
be able to send you Information as to where it is available.
I am sure the HAEB, National Association of Educational Broadcaster^,
would be interested in a series of exchange programs with SIF if it
were possible. I am asking the HAEB executive secretary to contact
you regarding this possibility.
I hope this will help you at least somewhat. If there is
an3rthing further I can do for you, feel free to contact me again.
Sincerely yours.
m'
Boland E. Fmis,
